title: Have Available to Trade:  Tinker, Powers, Pelty, Reulbach
author: Bpm0014

posts.post_title: Have Available to Trade:  Tinker, Powers, Pelty, Reulbach
posts.post_content:
I have recently upgraded these 4.  Have them available to trade (or if you want to buy the lot for $80 I will do that; free shipping).  If you need any of these and want to trade, please let me know.  I'll send a scan of each and my want list.  In parenthesis is what I originally paid for each.  Thanks!!

Tinker, Hands on Knees:  Horrible condition, back damage, missing a piece, discolored ($29)
Powers:  Fair to Good, Piedmont 150 back, clean back ($20)
Reulbach, No Glove Showing:  Trimmed at top, but great color, nice white borders, clean Polar Bear back ($22)
Pelty, Horizontal:  Fair to Poor, good color, multiple creases, back damage due to scrap book removal ($25)

Freindly reduction before Ebay:

Tinker: $22
Reulbach: $16
Pelty: $20

Take all 3 for $55 and $2 shipping.  Scans available upon request.
